00190 inline Operation get_operation(std::string const opr)
00191 {
00192   if (opr == "+") {
00193     return add_opr;
00194   } else if (opr == "if") {
00195     return if_opr;
00196   } else if (opr == "ceiling") {
00197     return ceil_opr;
00198   } else if (opr == "-") {
00199     return minus_opr;
00200   } else if (opr == "*") {
00201     return multiply_opr;
00202   } else if (opr == "/") {
00203     return divide_opr;
00204   } else if (opr == "floor") {
00205     return floor_opr;
00206   } else if (opr == "quote") {
00207     return quote_opr;
00208   } else if (opr == "cons") {
00209     return cons_opr;
00210   } else if (opr == "car") {
00211     return car_opr;
00212   } else if (opr == "cdr") {
00213     return cdr_opr;
00214   } else if (opr == "nullp") {
00215     return nullp_opr;
00216   } else {
00217     return undefined_opr;
00218   }
00219 }

00238 inline int list_size(Cell* const c)
00239 {
00240   int size = 0;
00241   Cell* curr = c;
00242 
00243   while(!nullp(curr)) {
00244     ++size;
00245     if (!listp(curr)) {
00246       return size;
00247     } else {
00248       curr = cdr(curr);
00249     }
00250   }
00251 
00252   return size;
00253 }
